name: qrveytest
description: This project contains source code and supporting files for a serverless application that you can deploy with CloudFormation.

scripts.packDB: cd database/ && npm run-script build && sam package --s3-bucket test-qrvey-bucket --template-file dynamo_db.yaml --output-template-file dynamo_db-pack.yaml
scripts.deplDB: cd database/ && sam deploy --template-file dynamo_db-pack.yaml --stack-name test-qrvey-db --region us-east-1 --capabilities CAPABILITY_NAMED_IAM
scripts.pack: npm run-script build && sam package --s3-bucket test-qrvey-bucket --template-file qrvey.yaml --output-template-file qrvey-pack.yaml
scripts.postbuild: (cp package.json dist/package.json && cd dist && npm install --only=production)
scripts.depl: sam deploy --template-file  qrvey-pack.yaml --s3-bucket test-qrvey-bucket --stack-name test-qrvey --region us-east-1 --capabilities CAPABILITY_NAMED_IAM --no-fail-on-empty-changeset

author: Daniel Gutierrez
